ygData.subject: Re: Fletching
ygData.msgSnippet: Stormhugh, I too spent many a day and night in the dark and twisting valleys of the ever cold land to the north of Qeynos Hills known as Everfrost. I started
ygData.messageBody:
Stormhugh, I too spent many a day and night in
the dark and twisting valleys of the ever cold land
to the north of Qeynos Hills known as Everfrost. I
started there as a young level 8 Ranger and stayed until
I made level 17. Take the time to get to know the
lay of the land and you will see that actually it is
a very easy area to get around in, track comes in
real handy to stay out of trouble. If you are in the
GFay area now then Butcher Block or Steamfont
Mountains will be a great place to hunt. Both places are
similar to Everfrost. Lots of canyons and
mountains.<br><br>Keban Arrowsmith<Royal Fletchers><br>Ranger of
Surefall Glade (Brell)<br>Ranger of 22 Seasons<br>Master
Fletcher<br>Ranger of Surefall Glade
